Bachmann won't seek new term

Minnesota congresswoman, tea party favorite, and former candidate for the GOP presidential nomination Michele Bachmann announced this morning on her website that she will not run for another term in the US House. Bachmann also said that recent inquiries into her 2012 presidential campaign did not affect her decision.

Post-workout soreness?
